1440100.name: Golden Light OST: The Meat Songs
1440100.description:
Experience a full Golden Light Original Soundtrack.

All your favourite tunes, from demonically haunting room themes to boss battles, Snout's tape recorder cassetes and memory washing Memento theme, all in one lovely package which is Golden Light OST: The Meat Song.

Produced by The Gut itself with meat, gold and love.
